text: Eppard may refer to: * 21484 Eppard, a main-belt asteroid, named after ISEF awardee Erin F. Eppard * Jim Eppard (born 1960), an American baseball player * Joey Eppard (born 1976), an American musician * Josh Eppard (born 1979), an American musician ==See also== * Eppards Point Township, located in Livingston County, Illinois, United States
title: Eppard
